author: Laura Stevens
title: What’s in Those Leftover Holiday Shipping Boxes? Cats
text:
Like most cats, Ricky and Rocky love boxes.
Their owner, Andres Acosta, bought them a $40 pet house online, but “they ended up sniffing it and never looked at it again.” So as Amazon.com Inc. holiday orders stacked up in Mr. Acosta’s Orlando, Fla., home, he used one of the large boxes to craft a turquoise and white fabric-covered “cat castle” with a blanketed roof deck for the pair.
“The...
